reviews.review_msg: A super friendly and knowledgeable guy but he is not good at teaching or creating a curriculum. Even for a theory-based course, he assigned a huge amount of reading (at least 3 readings averaging at about 70 pages) every week. His lectures are also often rambling and longer than necessary. He has not adjusted well to the online format.

Once he figured out how to structure his lectures, the amount of information he can pack into them in amazing. One of my favourite classes if nothing else because discussion is kept at a high standard. Would strongly recommend.

Michael is funny, laid-back, smart, and just a great guy to sit down and talk with. He's always available for a chat during office hours and treats everyone with respect. The course is not easy but put in the effort and you'll do fine.
